attributes.background: Social workers should wear body cameras to ensure that there is no miscommunication or lies. Many social workers have been caught out right lying to take people's children or put elderly people in care homes.

rejection.details:
Responsibility for social work is devolved. The UK Government would be responsible for taking this action in England, but not in other parts of the UK. 

You could start a new petition calling for social workers in England to be required to wear body cameras, if that's what you'd like to happen. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
